source.javadoc: This FilterReader class processes a sequence of characters from a source stream containing a mixture of 7-bit ASCII data and 'back-tick U' escaped sequences representing characters which have the possibility of being encoded in a user specified encoding The filter relies on knowing the target encoding and makes a determination as to whether a given supplied character in its source character stream is encodeable in the target encoding. If not, it is remains in its back-tick U escaped form.
